pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access and Analyze the Data from the Red Book of Endemic Plants of Peru // Access and analysis of data from `The Red Book of Endemic Plants of Peru` Len, B., Roque, J., Ulloa, C., Jorgensen, P.M., Pitman, N., Cano, A. (2006)doi:10.15381/rpb.v13i2.1782 providing taxonomic, geographic, and conservation information about Peru's endemic plant species. The package offers functions to check species inclusion, obtain updated taxonomic details, and explore the dataset.
